response.original_title: Around the Bed of a Dying Collaborator
response.overview: Unes is paralyzed after a massive stroke. He lies in bed in the family’s living room, watching the live feed from security cameras installed at the perimeter of his home - a matter of protection after several assaults on the family. "We are guilty, we’ve brought a shame on ourselves," this is how Unes summarizes decades of collaboration with Israeli security forces and helping Jews to buy land from Palestinians.
response.title: Around the Bed of a Dying Collaborator
